description.lang: Aeon Labs Doorbell supports playing MP3 music files with a press of this doorbell. It has a 128MB flash memory that can store up to 800 ringtones. The volume can be adjusted manually via short press on the Volume Button, also you can switch the doorbell sound to the next via long press on the Volume Button. You may change/update your doorbell ringtone at any point in time you want by connecting your Doorbell to your PC to update the sound track on your Doorbells flash memory.There is a small Wireless Button, which can trigger the doorbell on the other side of the wall to play the selected doorbell music when pressed.It also act as a repeater that forward Z-Wave command messages to destination nodes if the originating controller is out of range from the destination node.By taking advantage of the Z-Wave mesh network, commands can be routed to their destination via intermediary listening Z-Wave products. Products that are Z-Wave certified can be used and communicate with other Z-Wave certified devices.Also a tool that can be programmed, scheduled, controlled and communicated with from anywhere in the world.

Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate.When the Doorbell is received the commands sent by controller to be turned on or off, the Doorbell will send a basic report of its status to the nodes in association group 1. To change what kind of signal is sent to the nodes in group 1, please see the detailed description of configuration parameter 80.

When the Doorbell receives the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set, Switch Multilevel Start Level Change, Switch Multilevel Stop Level Change, Switch Multilevel Set commands from main controller. it will forward the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set, Switch Multilevel Start Level Change, Switch Multilevel Stop Level Change, Switch Multilevel Set to associated nodes in Group 2.

name.lang: Define the function ofButton- or Button+.

description.lang: This parameter is used to define the function of Button- or Button+.
Button- is defined to be the control item of Previous. Button+ is defined to be the control item of Next.
Button- is defined to be the control item of Next. Button+ is defined to be the control item of Previous.

name.lang: Define the function of Button- and Button+ when pressing it once and long pressing it.

description.lang: This parameter is used to define the function of Button- and Button+ when pressing it once and long pressing it.
Pressing it once, which will change the volume. Long pressing it, which will change the default ringtone.
Pressing it once, which will change the default ringtone. Long pressing it, which will change the the volume.

name.lang: Set the repetitions for playing doorbell ringtone.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the repetitions for playing doorbell ringtone.Note: If the time of playing doorbell ringtone is more than 20 seconds, the volume of ringtone will reduce to silence no matter how many repetitions of doorbell ringtone are set.
the range of repetition is 1 to 100.

name.lang: Pair the Wireless Button with Doorbell

description.lang: This parameter is used to pair the Wireless Button with Doorbell.Note:1. This procedure should only be used when the complimentary Wireless Button is missing or inoperable and you have another new Wireless Button that would be paired with your Doorbell.2. When the pairing is started, the blue led will blink slowly, at this time, you just need to press the Wireless Button once. If the blue led change to be solid, which means the pairing is successful. Otherwise, repeat the steps.
Start the Wireless Button pairing mode.
This parameter is used to enable/disable Lock all configuration parameters.(0 =disable, 1 = enable)
All configuration parameters are configurable.
All configuration parameters are not configurable (Locked).
This parameter is used to reset product to default factory setting. (There are just 2 values can be used).
Reset the product to default factory setting and be excluded from the Z-wave network.
Resets all configuration parameters to default setting.

name.lang: Get the battery status of Wireless Button.

description.lang: This parameter is used to get the battery status of Wireless Button.Note: Just need to send the configuration parameter 42 Get command to Doorbell. The configuration report value will be the status of battery.
The current battery status is normal battery level.
The current battery status is low battery level.
This parameter is used to set the default doorbell ringtone.
To set which ringtone number is the default ringtone.
This parameter is used to select a ringtone to play, which is onlyfor customer testing the doorbell ringtone.
Play the specified ringtone.
Stop playing.
This parameter is used to implement the control items.
Implement the control item of Play.
Implement the control item of Stop.
Implement the control item of Pause.
Implement the control item of Next.
Implement the control item of Previous.
This parameter is used to set the volume of ringtone.The volume has 10 levels can be set. Value=10, which is the max volume.Value=0, which is the min volume.
The max volume is 10, the min volume is 0.

name.lang: Enable/Disable to send notifications to associated devices to associated devices.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable to send notifications to associated devices (in Group 1) when the state of Doorbell Gen5s load is changed. (0=Send nothing, 1=Send hail CC, 2=Send basic report CC).
Send BASIC Report Command
Send Nothing (Disabled)
Send HAIL Command

name.lang: Enable/disable to send notification to associated devices.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable to send notification to associated devices (In group 1) just only when the Wireless Button's battery is in low battery status.
Disable
Enable
